builder().Description: Creates a builder for a Street View panorama orientation.

builder(com.google.android.gms.maps.mode.Description: Creates a builder for a Street View panorama orientation

Parameters: The angle, in degrees, of the orientation. See @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#StreetViewPanoramaOrientation#Builder#tilt_E@ for details of restrictions.
Direction of the orientation, in degrees clockwise from north. This value will be normalized to be within 0 degrees inclusive and 360 degrees exclusive.
Throws: if tilt is outside the range of -90 to 90 degrees inclusive.

ClassDesc: An immutable class that aggregates all user point of view parameters.
